data.question: What is the empirical formula of Mn(ina)2?
At what temperature was the crystal data for Xe@Mn(ina)2 298 K collected?
What is the maximum adsorption capacity of Xe gas in Mn(ina)2 as a function of temperature?
data.answer: The adsorption capacity of Xe gas goes through a maximum as a function of temperature from 200 to 338 K.

data.question: Is the gate-opening pressure for Xe adsorption in Mn(ina)2 higher at 245 K or 338 K?
data.answer: The gate-opening pressure for Xe adsorption in Mn(ina)2 is higher at 338 K.

data.question: Does the structure of Mn(ina)2 remain unchanged under Kr atmosphere at room temperature?
Is the effective pore width of activated Mn(ina)2 larger than that of Xe@Mn(ina)2 at 298 K?
What is the kinetic diameter of CO2?
What is the space group of Xe@Mn(ina)2 at 298 K?
Does the unit cell volume of Mn(ina)2 increase or decrease upon Xe adsorption at 298 K?
data.answer: The unit cell volume of Mn(ina)2 increases upon Xe adsorption at 298 K.

data.question: Is the gate-opening pressure for Kr adsorption in Mn(ina)2 higher at 275 K or 338 K?
data.answer: The gate-opening pressure for Kr adsorption in Mn(ina)2 is higher at 338 K.

data.question: Does the crystal structure of Mn(ina)2 change under Xe atmosphere at room temperature?
Is the adsorption behavior of Xe in Mn(ina)2 at temperatures above 298 K normal?
What is the crystal system of Mn(ina)2?
What is the maximum transmission value for the absorption correction of Xe@Mn(ina)2 at 240 K?
Does the effective pore width of Mn(ina)2 increase with temperature under Xe atmosphere?
Is the density of Xe@Mn(ina)2 at 298 K higher than that of the activated Mn(ina)2?
What is the absorption coefficient of Xe@Mn(ina)2 at 275 K?
What is the change in the unit cell volume of Mn(ina)2 upon Xe adsorption from 200 K to 298 K?
data.answer: The unit cell volume of Mn(ina)2 increases from 1287.79 Å3 at 200 K to 1378.49 Å3 at 298 K upon Xe adsorption.

data.question: Does the gate-opening pressure for Xe adsorption decrease as temperature increases?
Is the Mn(ina)2 framework selective for Xe over Kr at temperatures above 260 K?
